value: - Güiria offers the only ferry service from Venezuela to Trinidad. Boats leave weekly on Wednesdays at 3pm but you must arrive 2 hours beforehand. The journey is about 3.5 hours. Inbound ferries from Trinidad depart at 9am and arrive in Güiria around 12:30pm in the afternoon. Call Ferry Trinidad Acosta y Asociados for more information, 0294 9820058, or in Trinidad, Pier 1 Marines Ltd 868 634-4472. A single/return trip is US$92/184 plus departure taxes (half price for children ages 2-11; children under 2 years ride free).
